Name:
USS Winjah
HMS Reaper
Fate:
Transferred to the Royal Navy
Sold as a merchant ship; scrapped in 1967
Class and type:
Bogue-class escort carrier (US)
Ruler-class escort carrier (UK)
Propulsion: Steam turbines, one shaft, 8,500 shp (6,300 kW)
Armament:
2 × 4"/50, 5"/38 or 5"/51 guns
4 × twin 40 mm Bofors
10 × single 20 mm Oerlikon
